com.chap.links.client
Class DataConnector.Options

java.lang.Object
  AbstractDrawOptions
      com.chap.links.client.DataConnector.Options
Enclosing class:
DataConnector
public static class DataConnector.Options
extends AbstractDrawOptions

Options for drawing the treegrid. Create an instance via the method create, for example TreeGrid.Options options = TreeGrid.Options.create();

public final void setDataTransferAllowedEffect(java.lang.String allowedEffect)
Specify which drag operations are allowed for the items in this dataconnector.

Parameters:
allowedEffect - Available values are 'copy', 'move', 'link', 'copyLink', 'copyMove', 'linkMove', 'all', 'none'.

setColumnFormat

public final void setColumnFormat(int index,
                                  java.lang.String format)
Set a format function for a column to format the output. for example: format = "function () {return this.firstname + ' ' + this.lastname;}" WARNING: Evaluating a string in javscript is unsafe, it is recommended to a native JavaScript function instead.

Parameters:
index - zero based column index
format - string containing a javascript format function

setColumnFormat

                                  JavaScriptObject format)
Set a format function for a column to format the output. for example: format = function () {return this.firstname + ' ' + this.lastname;}

Parameters:
index - zero based column index
format - a javascript function
